This interactive map is for reference only and doesn't relieve the user from the laws and regulations of other jurisdictions. Specifically, this map illustrates roads that have been authorized for OHV (Off Highway Vehicle) use in accordance with Ordinance 12 effective November 12, 2014. OHV use on those roads located within the corporate limits of the City of Grand Junction, Fruita, Palisade, Debeque, Collbran as well as our Federal Partners are contingent upon specific municipal and federal approval.
